University of Utah
Salt lake City
THE EXTENSION DIVISION
UNIVERSITY RADIO-TELEVISION
July 22, 1957
Mrs. Judith B. Gans
NAEB Headquarters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mrs. Gans:
My correct mailing address for the TV Research
Fact Sheet is: Dr. Keith M. Engar, Director
Radio Television Productions
114 Kingsbury Hall
University of Utah
Salt Lake City, Utah
Please discontinue sending the Fact Sheet to the
Paris address.
Sincerely
